duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop market strategies through class and risk management techniques.
Create product initiatives, rating, and filing strategies.
Partner with Claims team in the review of claim management protocols, state loss trends, and large loss reviews.
Oversee research of national, state, and product industry trends to develop strategies in order to take advantage of changing markets prior to the competition.
Set goals and objectives for the team to achieve operational results of the assigned territory.
Ensure policies and procedures are upheld and followed by the team, peers, and stakeholders.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Management, Mathematics, Management Information, Finance, Actuarial Science, Economics or other analytics related field (Master's preferred)
